name: Anders Møller
content: Anders Møller Anders Møller Home Research Publications Students Anders Møller Dept. of Computer Science Aarhus University IT-parken, Aabogade 34 DK-8200 Aarhus N, Denmark Office: Turing-224 [directions] Phone: (+45) 23309994 WWW: http://cs.au.dk/~amoeller Email: amoeller@cs.au.dk PhD, Professor, Vice Head of Department at Department of Computer Science, Aarhus University. Main research interests include programming languages and software engineering, in particular static and dynamic program analysis. Curriculum Vitae (PDF). DBLP. AU PURE. ACM DL. Google Scholar. LinkedIn. Bluesky. Chairman of the PhD committee at CS AU. Vice-Chair of ACM SIGPLAN. Associate Editor of ACM TOPLAS and ACM TOSEM. ACM Distinguished Member Recipient of the Danish Elite Research Prize 2020. Co-founder at Coana. April 2025 Coana has been acquired by Socket! Read the announcement. Static Program Analysis Anders Møller and Michael I. Schwartzbach Aarhus University Recent and upcoming events: OOPSLA'26 (Review Committee Chair) Summer School on Security Testing and Verification 2024 (invited lecturer) Marktoberdorf Summer School 2024 (invited lecturer) PLDI'24 (Area Chair) OOPSLA'24 (Associate Chair) ICSE'24 (PC member) ECOOP'23 (PC member) OOPSLA'23 (PC member) ISSTA'22 (PC member) ECOOP'22 (PC member) ICSE'22 (PC member) OOPSLA'21 (AEC co-chair) ECOOP'21, Aarhus, Denmark online (General Chair) ICSE'21, (PC member, Area Chair of software testing/debugging/program analysis) ICCQ'21 (keynote speaker) SAS'20 (PC member) DLS'20 (PC member) OOPSLA'20 (AEC co-chair and ERC member) SAS'19, Porto, Portugal (PC member) ISSTA'19, Beijing, China (PC chair) PLISS'19, Bertinoro, Italy (invited lecturer)
